body.p: DocBook Targetset documents are used to resolve cross references with DocBook olink's.
DocBook Targetset document typeassociation rulesA file is considered to be a Targetset when the root name is targetset.
DocBook Targetset document typeschemaThis type of documents use a DTD and schema located in [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/docbook/xsl/common/targetdatabase.dtd.
